    RecordingLayout
    RecordingProperties.recordingLayout()
    Defines the layout to be used in the recording.
    Will only have effect for Recording.OutputMode.COMPOSED or Recording.OutputMode.COMPOSED_QUICK_START recordings with RecordingProperties.hasVideo() to true.
